posts.post_content:
Hi everyone, 

I have for trade a very presentable Stahl Cycle 460. Between SGC and PSA pop reports the number I see is 6. Id like to use it to trade for any card on this list in good to very good condition:

- Brown (Cubs)
- Walsh
- Evers (portrait)
- Joss (portrait)
- Matty (black cap)
- Revelle
- Shag Shaughnessy
- Speaker
- Tinker (portrait)
- Waddell (either)
- Wheat

Will also part with the card for $190 OBO

Thanks,
Wazoo
Actually 6 graded between SGC and PSA.  4 SGC and 2 PSA.  Still very tough obviously.  You know it's trimmed right?

Correction made, thanks Luke. Missed the line above on the SGC pop report. Still a tough card.

I noticed the top corners were sharper than the bottom ones, but was still unsure of it actually being trimmed. It is listed as presentable with no promises of a numerical grade.
